abstract: Potash’s chief executive took to a new forum, YouTube, to defend his company against an unsolicited bid from BHP Billiton.
snippet: Potash’s chief executive took to a new forum, YouTube, to defend his company against an unsolicited bid from BHP Billiton.
lead_paragraph: William Doyle, the chief executive of the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, hasn’t been shy about dismissing BHP Billiton‘s nearly $40 billion takeover offer for his company.

headline.main: Potash’s Chief Speaks Out on BHP Bid
